goal: Finding And Registering For a Class
caption: The user is registered. Classes are shown in the user's calendar and schedule
The user wants to view their major requirements
Current view shows the user their requirments
The user adds a class from their major requirments list
The user is registered for the class as showin in the calendar and schedule
User wants to auto enroll in classes when registration opens. She clicks to change her class priorities.
The course priority is switched
The user adds another class
The class conflicts with other classes. Thankfully, other sections of the class are highlighted.
By clicking, the user can register for another period of the clas
The courses are switched resolving the timing conflict
The user enters the name for a new class. They don't need to use the classes official name
The search results are displayed
The search result is clicked
The user is brought to a course description page
The user clicks X to exit the course description page
The user returns to the previous page
